attributes.action: Issue appropriate orders banning Islam4uk, or any other group, from promoting or organising any parade through the town of Wootton Bassett in protest at British military involvement in Afghanistan and Iraq.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst recognising a basic right to peaceful demonstration, any such protest held at Wootton Basset would be grossly offensive to next of kin of service personnel killed in action, to existing serving personnel and their families and to the broader community of Wootton Bassett and the country as a whole. Furthermore, permitting any such protest would be likely to hugely overemphasise the level of support that these radical groups have, and would be likely to inflame racial tension.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
